about_the_game:
Change up your hunter's sound with this special voice option!

She may sound cute at first, but she turns violent and aggressive at the drop of a hat! Represent both sides of your hunter with this unusual voice.

After purchasing, select Change Appearance in the Item Box to apply to your hunter.

Note: This item is cosmetic only and does not confer any status benefits.

  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 1030 (DDR4) or AMD Radeon™ RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 23 GB available space
